meanings.definition: The state or quality of being frothy.
meanings.sent1: The frothiness of the milk made the cappuccino look extra delicious.
meanings.sent2: I love the frothiness of a freshly poured beer.
meanings.sent3: The frothiness of the bubble bath made it seem like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: The frothiness of the ocean waves reminded her of whipped cream.
meanings.sent5: The frothiness of the latte added a touch of elegance to the morning routine.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a light, bubbly texture.
meanings.sent1: Her cake had the perfect frothiness, making it airy and delightful.
meanings.sent2: The frothiness of the mousse made it melt in your mouth.
meanings.sent3: The frothiness of the pillow made it feel like sleeping on a cloud.
meanings.sent4: The frothiness of the soap bubbles made bath time fun for the kids.
meanings.sent5: The frothiness of the whipped cream on the hot chocolate was a treat for the taste buds.

meanings.definition: The presence of foam or bubbles on the surface of a liquid.
meanings.sent1: The frothiness of the soda indicated it was freshly opened.
meanings.sent2: The frothiness of the river water showed its purity.
meanings.sent3: The frothiness of the champagne made the celebration even more special.
meanings.sent4: The frothiness of the hot tub water added to the relaxing atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The frothiness of the soap bubbles in the sink made washing dishes a bit more fun.
